entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
